Class NetworkUtilization

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.payloads.NetworkUtilization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeSensitive

    public class NetworkUtilization
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimeSensitive
    Utility class for keeping track of the the amount of time the network is used vs. idle.
